full_text:
When analysing prop bet results for 2021/22 season there is a clear slew to the under on ALL RB markets, with the most prominent being the longest rush only hitting over at a 17% rate! 

How we feeling about Joe Mixon & Cam Akers longest rush prop of 13.5?

#nflverse
#RStats https://t.co/Jl9BSDB0xs

Hopefully we get a Super Bowl as good as the rest of these playoff games. 

Calculating Game Excitement Index (GEI) similar to how I saw @recspecs730 do for CBB, the divisional and conf champ rounds are going to be hard to beat. Especially Buf vs KC.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/RyWHfnrLSh
